briefTitle: Deep Learning With MRI-based Multimodal-data Fusion Enhanced Postoperative Risk Stratification of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Deep Learning With MRI-based Multimodal-data Fusion Enhanced Postoperative Risk Stratification of Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologically confirmed stage I-III invasive BC
* Age ≥ 18 years
* The patient having undergone surgery
* The existence of MRI scans

Exclusion Criteria:

* Lacked pathological results
* Had other, simultaneous malignancies
* Had MR imaging issues were excluded
